drupalNodeEvent.title: India, China, Africa: Emerging Transnational Politics in the Global South

field_speakers.processed: Lina Benabdallah (Wake Forest University), Manjusha Nair (George Mason University), Xiaoyang Tang (Carnegieâ€“Tsinghua Center for Global Policy), Veda Vaidyanathan (Institute of Chinese Studies, Delhi)

field_organizers.processed: India China Institute at The New School in partnership with Africa is A Country

field_description.processed: The panel will explore how Africa has become both frontier and partner for India and China in realms of trade, infrastructure, finance, technology, and most recently COVID diplomacy, creating new hierarchies and imperatives for transnational politics in the South.
